overview:
Trilibis Mobile provides advanced enterprise mobile web solutions and hybrid apps.

We create, develop and manage rich, “app-like” mobile web experiences utilizing a modern flexible cloud-based mobile development platform, we call SmartPath®.

It works. Powered by Trilibis, Fandandgo’s mobile web site was selected as the Best Mobile Website of the year in 2011 by DigiDay’s Mobi Awards.

SmartPath combines mobile device detection and real-time mobile rendering technology with extensive libraries and UI building tools, resulting in the creation of dynamic mobile web sites that integrate seamlessly into back-end databases.
